game.name: Princess vs Villains Tug of War
game.description:
This challenge is going to be very big since the competition takes place between your beloved Disney Princesses and Villains! This super fun test of strength aka tug of war makes them stand against each other. The Team of gorgeous princesses includes Elsa, Ariel and Aurora while Ursula, Cruella and Maleficent are going to represent the Villains Team.  The intense pressure caused by this big fashion competition has forced them to hire you as their personal stylist. Join Princess Vs Villain Tug-Of-War and be prepared to help them all to pick up the perfect outfits!

Use your strong fashion sense to help your Disney characters to choose the comfy sporty outfits first in this brand new girls game! Go through their wide and exclusive collection of extremely beautiful printed tops and match them with an extensive variety of matching shorts and leggings! Hey ladies! Do not forget to complete their selected dresses with some girly-girl accessories in this HTML5 dressing game. Your job does not end here as you also have to help the Villains Team.

Click the next click button to move to the next page and help villain girls to dress up with some equally chick outfits in this one of the coolest girls games! Hey girls! The task starts when both princesses and villains team get ready. Now click on each of them to support the Princesses Team and make them feel happy! All the best to have a blast in our more popular titles from the category of free dress-up games for girls and boys that are playable on multiple devices without download!
